title: SparkHacks
content: My friends and I joined a hackathon hosted by the University of Illinois Chicago students. Our team of five built a bidding website with the theme of helping small businesses. Users would post jobs with a budget, and companies would bid to win the job. I had a lot of fun, and I gained a lot of team experience.

title: IT Internship | Summer 2025
content: Over the summer, I got the opportunity to work with the IT Department for the College of Engineering at the University of Illinois Chicago. I gained a great amount of experience in providing support via TDX ticketing: triaged/resolved hardware & software issues, configured peripherals. As well as building and administrating VMs on Proxmox VM and automated OS imaging/deployment with FOG server standardize workstation rollouts.

title: Upcoming
content: I will continue to write about my experiences and opportunities that I encounter along the way.
